virtual_dns_deprecation.description:
Please replace "virtual_dns" in DNS Firewall routes with "dns_firewall".

The following changes were made in the new routes:

- virtual_dns_ips has been renamed to dns_firewall_ips.
- A disabled ratelimit is now represented by null instead of 0.
- The PATCH method must be used instead of PUT to update clusters.

links.title: List DNS Firewall Clusters
links.description: List configured DNS Firewall clusters for an account

per_page.description: Number of DNS records per page

links.response:

        "192.0.2.1",
        "198.51.100.1",
        "2001:DB8:100::CF"
      ],
      "virtual_dns_ips": [
        "203.0.113.1",
        "203.0.113.254",
        "2001:DB8:AB::CF",
        "2001:DB8:CD::CF"

  ]
}

links.title: Update DNS Firewall Cluster
links.description: Modify a DNS Firewall Cluster configuration
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/virtual_dns/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"id":"9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac","name":"My Awesome DNS Firewall cluster","origin_ips":["192.0.2.1","198.51.100.1","2001:DB8:100::CF"],"virtual_dns_ips":["203.0.113.1","203.0.113.254","2001:DB8:AB::CF","2001:DB8:CD::CF"],"minimum_cache_ttl":60,"maximum_cache_ttl":900,"negative_cache_ttl":900,"deprecate_any_requests":true,"ecs_fallback":false,"ratelimit":600,"modified_on":"2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"}'

deprecate_any_requests.description: Deprecate the response to ANY requests

ecs_fallback.description: Forward client IP (resolver) subnet if no EDNS Client Subnet is sent

ratelimit.description: Ratelimit in queries per second per datacenter (applies to DNS queries sent to the origin nameservers configured on the cluster).
ratelimit.cfNotes: A ratelimit of 0 turns off the ratelimit. Otherwise the minimum is 100.

modified_on.description: Last modification of DNS Firewall cluster

parameters.example:
{
  "id": "9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac",
  "name": "My Awesome DNS Firewall cluster",
  "origin_ips": [
    "192.0.2.1",
    "198.51.100.1",
    "2001:DB8:100::CF"
  ],
  "virtual_dns_ips": [
    "203.0.113.1",
    "203.0.113.254",
    "2001:DB8:AB::CF",
    "2001:DB8:CD::CF"
  ],
  "minimum_cache_ttl": 60,
  "maximum_cache_ttl": 900,
  "negative_cache_ttl": 900,
  "deprecate_any_requests": true,
  "ecs_fallback": false,
  "ratelimit": 600,
  "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"
}

links.title: Delete DNS Firewall Cluster
links.description: Delete a configured DNS Firewall Cluster

links.title: Create DNS Firewall Cluster
links.description: Create a configured DNS Firewall Cluster
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/virtual_dns" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"My Awesome DNS Firewall cluster","origin_ips":["192.0.2.1","198.51.100.1","2001:DB8:100::CF"],"minimum_cache_ttl":60,"maximum_cache_ttl":900,"negative_cache_ttl":900,"deprecate_any_requests":true,"ecs_fallback":false,"ratelimit":600}'

deprecate_any_requests.description: Deprecate the response to ANY requests

ratelimit.description: Ratelimit in queries per second per datacenter (applies to DNS queries sent to the origin nameservers configured on the cluster).
ratelimit.cfNotes: A ratelimit of 0 turns off the ratelimit. Otherwise the minimum is 100.

  "name": "My Awesome DNS Firewall cluster",
  "origin_ips": [
